short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically add spaces between Chinese and half-width characters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
自动空格优化是一款智能的排版助手，专为提升中英文混排文本的阅读体验而设计。

主要功能：
✨ 智能空格：自动在中文与英文之间添加恰当的空格
✨ 数字优化：优化中文与数字之间的间距
✨ 符号处理：智能处理中文与半角符号的排版
✨ 实时优化：支持对动态加载的内容进行实时处理
✨ 简洁界面：提供简单直观的开关控制
✨ 高效运行：采用节流技术，不影响浏览体验

使用场景：
• 阅读技术文档
• 浏览新闻文章
• 查看社交媒体
• 编辑在线文本

无需复杂设置，安装后即可享受更优雅的阅读体验。让您的网页浏览更加舒适，告别杂乱的排版！

Auto Space is an intelligent typography assistant designed to enhance the reading experience of mixed Chinese and English text.

Key Features:
✨ Smart Spacing: Automatically adds appropriate spaces between Chinese and English text
✨ Number Optimization: Optimizes spacing between Chinese characters and numbers
✨ Symbol Processing: Intelligently handles typography between Chinese and half-width symbols
✨ Real-time Processing: Supports real-time processing of dynamically loaded content
✨ Clean Interface: Provides simple and intuitive toggle controls
✨ Efficient Performance: Implements throttling technology for smooth browsing experience

Use Cases:
• Reading technical documentation
• Browsing news articles
• Viewing social media
• Editing online text

No complex setup required - install and enjoy a more elegant reading experience immediately. Make your web browsing more comfortable and say goodbye to cluttered typography!
